inclusion.criterion: Adults (aged ≥18 years) visiting a participating ED for a seizure or an epilepsy-related concern.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adults on anti-seizure medication prior to coming to the ED or prescribed anti-seizure medication at the ED.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Providing informed consent and having sufficient English language skills to complete questionnaires and participate in the intervention.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous participation in the C2C program.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known diagnosis of psychogenic non-epileptic seizures (PNES).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy, CHF, and depression. He was recently tapered off Dilantin and had no further seizure events during hospitalization.
